admission_requirements.summary: This text provides a list of links and information related to university admissions, including applying for CUET Counselling, details about the admission process, courses and fees for 2025-26, scholarship and loan options, transport, hostels, admission alerts, outreach teams, Ph.D. admissions, and domestic brochures for Indian students. It also includes a direct link to "Apply Now 2025".
